content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-5.0, 2.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position -9.5, -0.5), boiler (position -5.0, 2.5), steam engine (position 0.5, 6.5), pipes connecting offshore pump to boiler and boiler to steam engine, and small electric poles connecting steam engine to other entities.

### Coal mine at position(16.0, 0.0)
Consists of burner mining drill (position 16.0, 0.0), wooden chest (position 16.5, 1.5) to collect coal, and burner inserter (position 17.5, 1.5) to take coal from chest.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting transport belts directly from a chest
- Ensure that an inserter is used to take items from the chest before connecting to transport belts.

### Errors when placing entities next to an existing entity with insufficient spacing
- Increase the spacing or change the direction when placing entities next to an existing entity.

### NAMESPACE

No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
